attributes.description:
The Ford Ranger is a fantastic bakkie, with exceptional build quality, a roomy interior and with one of the smoothest suspension set-ups on the market. The 3.2L 5 Cylinder turbocharged diesel engine is a gem, combining great power, with better than average fuel consumption. This particular Ranger has also been equipped with smash n grab safety film, tonneau cover, roll bar, rubberised load-bin, as well as a snorkel.

Don't miss out. Call us now, or leave your details and we will be sure to call you.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs. E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.
